dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, Host_B, did you see the footage coming out of Kazakhstan? Something pretty wild just happened.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, Host B, did you see the footage coming out of Kazakhstan? Something pretty wild just happened.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no, I missed that! What's up? Is it, uh, about President Xi Jinping's visit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no, I missed that! What's up? Is it, uh, about President Xi Jinping's visit?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He just landed in Astana, right? But here's the thing: his plane was actually escorted by fighter jets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He just landed in Astana, right? But here's the thing: his plane was actually escorted by fighter jets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Footage has emerged showing fighter jets escorting Chinese President Xi Jinping™s plane to Astana Airport, citing the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, really? Fighter jets? That's, um, quite the welcome committee.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, really? Fighter jets? That's, um, quite the welcome committee.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Akorda press service confirmed it. From the moment the aircraft entered Kazakh airspace until it arrived in the capital, it was, like, flanked by their Air Defense Forces.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Akorda press service confirmed it. From the moment the aircraft entered Kazakh airspace until it arrived in the capital, it was, like, flanked by their Air Defense Forces.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Akorda, from the moment the aircraft entered Kazakhstan™s airspace until its arrival in the capital, it was accompanied by fighter jets from the country™s Air Defense Forces.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, I mean, that's a serious show of, you know, respect and partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, I mean, that's a serious show of, you know, respect and partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. He's there for a two-day official visit, apparently, at the invitation of President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. He's there for a two-day official visit, apparently, at the invitation of President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Xi Jinping has arrived in Kazakhstan for a two-day official visit at the invitation of President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, what are they, um, expected to discuss? High-level stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what are they, um, expected to discuss? High-level stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: High-level bilateral talks, yeah. All about strengthening that comprehensive strategic partnership between the two nations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: High-level bilateral talks, yeah. All about strengthening that comprehensive strategic partnership between the two nations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the visit, the two leaders are expected to hold high-level bilateral talks focused on further strengthening the comprehensive strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this: on June 17th, Astana's also hosting the second Central Asia-China summit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this: on June seventeenth, Astana's also hosting the second Central Asia-China summit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second Central Asia " China summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so with other regional heads of state, too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so with other regional heads of state, too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. All the big players from across the region will be there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. All the big players from across the region will be there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 17, Astana will host the second Central Asia " China summit, with the participation of heads of state from across the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a pretty big, um, diplomatic week for Kazakhstan then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a pretty big, um, diplomatic week for Kazakhstan then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. But honestly, those fighter jets really set the tone, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. But honestly, those fighter jets really set the tone, didn't they?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Definitely makes a statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Definitely makes a statement.
